content: परितोषः {@--1@} Contentment, absence of desire (<ab>opp.</ab> लोभ); सम इह परितोषो निर्विशेषो विशेषः <ls>Bh. 3. 50.</ls> {@--2@} Complete satisfaction, gratification; आपरितोषाद्विदुषां न साधु मन्ये प्रयोगविज्ञानं <ls>Ś. 1. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Pleasure, delight, delight in, liking for (with <ab>loc.</ab>); <ls>Ku. 6. 59</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 92</ls>; गुणिनि परितोषः &c.
